name: Hover Low
description:
Hello I'm a German game developer and this is my first game hope you like it :)

It's a small hover racer game in which you change direction via pressing space bar or the touch screen on mobile, you have to avoid the walls and collect money to buy ships/maps and as a method of tracking your highscore, I really like particle effects so the game will feature many many particles (the spawning of those particles will be improved in v0.2 or v0.3)

There are 9 Ships and I'm planning to make multiple maps

There will never be any micro transactions, ads, bitcoin miners or a paid version of this game but i would really appreciate it if you could donate so that I can focus on improving this game and making new ones ;)

The Game is in early access there will be many more versions so don't except a lot of content at this point, but its coming :D

There is a Windows, Linux, Mac OS, IOS and Android version but i only tested Linux and Android, in the future I want to make a free Browser version too

If you have feedback about the game please don hesitate to write a comment and Thank You very much for playing

I would really appreciate it if you could share this game with your friends or in forums :)

Roadmap

v0.2   Quit Button / UI Scaling Fixes / Particle Spawner Overhaul
